mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_PATH, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_SCORE, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_PATH, REVIEW_CONTENT, CASE WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 1 THEN '★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 2 THEN '★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 3 THEN '★★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 4 THEN '★★★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 5 THEN '★★★★★' END AS "REVIEW_SCORE", TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') "CREATE_DATE", MEMBER_ID FROM TB_REVIEW LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (TB_REVIEW.RESERVATION_NO = TB_RESERVATION.RESERVATION_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_RESERVATION.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SITE ON (TB_SITE.SITE_NO = TB_RESERVATION.SITE_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_CAMP ON (TB_CAMP.CAMP_NO = TB_SITE.CAMP_NO) WHERE TB_CAMP.CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND REVIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (TB_RESERVATION.RESERVATION_NO = TB_REVIEW.RESERVATION_NO) JOIN TB_SITE ON (TB_SITE.SITE_NO = TB_RESERVATION.SITE_NO) JOIN TB_CAMP ON (TB_CAMP.CAMP_NO = TB_SITE.CAMP_NO) WHERE REVIEW_YN = 'Y' AND TB_CAMP.CAMP_NO = #{campNo}

SELECT REVIEW_PATH, REVIEW_CONTENT, CASE WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 1 THEN '★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 2 THEN '★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 3 THEN '★★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 4 THEN '★★★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 5 THEN '★★★★★' END AS "REVIEW_SCORE", TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') "CREATE_DATE", MEMBER_ID FROM TB_REVIEW LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON (TB_REVIEW.RESERVATION_NO = TB_RESERVATION.RESERVATION_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_RESERVATION.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_SITE ON (TB_SITE.SITE_NO = TB_RESERVATION.SITE_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_CAMP ON (TB_CAMP.CAMP_NO = TB_SITE.CAMP_NO) WHERE TB_CAMP.CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND REVIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
